# thebrightbyte.com

> The BrightByte builds compliance-friendly AI agents, fine-tuned models, and automated workflows for regulated industries.

## Core Services
- AI Agent Development (agentic AI, orchestration)
- LLM Fine-Tuning (custom models, SLMs)
- RAG Systems (vector DB, knowledge retrieval)
- Compliance AI Automation (SOC2, HIPAA)

## Industries
- FinTech (payments, KYC, fraud detection)
- HealthTech (HIPAA, clinical AI)
- LawTech (document automation, contracts)
- RegTech (regulatory reporting, compliance)
- InsurTech (claims, underwriting)
- GovTech (public sector, FedRAMP)

## Technical Capabilities
- CRM AI Integration (Salesforce, HubSpot)
- ERP AI Automation (SAP, Oracle)
- API Workflow Orchestration
- No-Code AI Solutions
- Multi-Agent AI Architecture

## Key Content Sections
- /cases - AI agent implementations, compliance automation projects
- /playbook/expertise - Technical guides on AI agents, fine-tuning, RAG systems
- /playbook/insights - AI compliance, industry trends, and analysis
- /investments - Strategic investments in AI and RegTech

## Contact
Website: https://thebrightbyte.com
Location: Raleigh, NC, USA
